title: The voters in New York?
subtitle: The voters in New York will not be removed from the main polling sites for wearing T-shirts in support of any particular candidate, and polling hours have not been interrupted to prevent people from voting before work.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The voters in New York will be removed from the ballot box if they wear T-shirts that support specific candidates, and the polling hours are deliberately shortened to suppress initial votes.
